sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react";
import { Icon, Menu, Sidebar as SideBar, Container } from "semantic-ui-react";

export const Sidebar = ({ children, items }) => {
  // s

  return (
    <SideBar.Pushable>
      <SideBar
        width="thin"
        size="large"
        as={Menu}
        animation="overlay"
        icon="labeled"
        vertical
        visible={true}
      >
        <Menu.Item as="a">
          <Icon name="home" />
          Home
        </Menu.Item>
        <Menu.Item as="a">
          <Icon name="gamepad" />
          Games
        </Menu.Item>
        <Menu.Item as="a">
          <Icon name="camera" />
          Channels
        </Menu.Item>
      </SideBar>
      <SideBar.Pusher style={{ minHeight: "100vh" }}>
        <Menu color="teal" inverted size="massive" borderless fixed="top">
          <Menu.Item as="a" color="white">
            <Icon name="camera" />
            Log out
          </Menu.Item>
        </Menu>
        <Container fluid style={{ paddingLeft: 165, paddingTop: 65 }}>
          {children}
        </Container>
      </SideBar.Pusher>
    </SideBar.Pushable>
  );
};
